entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle and flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 8:05 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:05 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 8:05 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
